titleStmt.title: An Account of the seizing or apprehending, behaviour, confession, and commitment to Newgate of Mary St. Dunstan (born near Temple-bar), the bloody midwife's servant committed by warrant from the right honourable Sir John Fleet, knight, Lord Mayor : with an account of reasons for the midwife's poysoning of her self in Newgate.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wallis near the Green Dragon Tavern in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon Tavern in Fleet-street
